basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello I'm Erik Dodd and welcome to my Portfolio Page! I'm a Software Developer with over 5 years of experience in Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service. I'm passionate about Technology and building websites and applications that users find aesthetically pleasing and interactive. I'm pursuing a career in Software Development because I enjoy problem-solving, and learning new skills, and using technology for social good. I have experience working in businesses of all sizes including start-ups, enterprise-level Tech Companies, small businesses, and even in the non-profit sector. I'm a strong individual performer with a history of consistently high KPI performance. I value the importance of teamwork and building quality relationships with my colleagues and clients.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.
